Global Annual Employee Forum in Madrid
9  October,  2023
Best Buddies Qatar participated in the annual forum for Best Buddies employees from branches worldwide, representing 33 countries. A representative from Best Buddies Qatar delivered an introductory lecture to the attendees, highlighting the achievements of Best Buddies Qatar since its establishment in 2008, and a promotional video was showcased. The attendees exchanged experiences and knowledge, sharing best practices in the field.
